title: Verify fixed header visibility on desktop
description: Check that the fixed header remains visible and correctly positioned on the viewport when scrolling on desktop browsers.

steps.description: Open the landing page in a desktop browser.
Scroll down through the page content.
Verify the header stays fixed at the top of the viewport and is fully visible.

title: Verify fixed header visibility on mobile
description: Check that the fixed header remains visible and correctly positioned on mobile devices when scrolling.

steps.description: Open the landing page in a mobile browser or emulator.
Scroll through the page content.
Verify that the header is always visible and fixed at the top of the viewport.

title: Validate mobile hamburger menu toggle open and close
description: Check that clicking the hamburger menu toggles its open/close state, with corresponding icon and label updates.

steps.description: Open the landing page on a mobile device or emulator.
Locate and tap the hamburger menu icon.
Verify the menu opens, the icon changes to close icon, and the label updates accordingly.
Tap the hamburger menu icon again.
Verify the menu closes, the icon returns to hamburger icon, and the label updates accordingly.

title: Anchor navigation scrolls smoothly with offset
description: Test that clicking anchor links in the header menu scrolls to the respective sections with a smooth animation and correct offset to avoid header overlay.

steps.description: Click each anchor navigation link: Home, About, Services, Payments, Contact.
Verify that the page scrolls smoothly and the section content is fully visible, not hidden behind the fixed header.

title: 'Agende Agora' button scrolls to Contact section
description: Check that clicking the 'Agende Agora' CTA button scrolls the user smoothly and reliably to the contact section.

steps.description: Locate and click the 'Agende Agora' CTA button on the page.
Verify the page smoothly scrolls to the contact section.
Verify the contact section is fully visible and not obscured by the fixed header.

title: Verify service cards display correct icons and titles
description: Check that each service card renders with the correct icon and service title as specified.

steps.description: Navigate to the Services section.
Verify each service card shows the correct 3D icon or image and the accurate service title.

title: Validate service cards pricing tables by pet size and service type
description: Check pricing tables within service cards display correct prices according to pet size and service category, including Saturday-only Taxi Dog condition.

steps.description: Open each service card in the Services section.
Verify prices correspond correctly to pet sizes and types per the business rules.
Ensure the Taxi Dog service displays availability only on Saturdays.

title: Verify payment methods and fee details accuracy
description: Check that the Payments section lists exactly four payment methods: Credit, Debit with fixed fee, Pix, and Cash, including notes on debit card fees.

steps.description: Navigate to the Payments section.
Verify that the payment methods Credit, Debit, Pix, and Cash are all listed.
Confirm that debit card payment fee information is clearly and accurately displayed.

title: Validate contact section clickable links and prefilled WhatsApp message
description: Check that the phone number and WhatsApp button are clickable and open correct communication channels, with WhatsApp button containing the specified prefilled message.

steps.description: In the Contact section, click the phone number link.
Verify the device initiates a phone call or opens the dialer with the correct number.
Click the WhatsApp contact button.
Verify WhatsApp opens or redirects with the prefilled message ready to send.
Confirm the Instagram handle and address are correctly displayed and linked or presented as specified.

title: Check IntersectionObserver fade-in animations trigger correctly
description: Test that service cards and highlight sections fade in as they enter the viewport using IntersectionObserver.

steps.description: Scroll through the Services and Highlights sections slowly.
Verify each service card and highlight visually fade in as it becomes visible in the viewport.

title: Validate mobile hamburger menu accessibility and usability
description: Check that the hamburger menu is accessible via keyboard and screen readers, toggles correctly, and navigation items are properly focusable.

steps.description: Open the landing page on a mobile device or emulator.
Use keyboard navigation to focus and toggle the hamburger menu.
Verify that menu toggling works with keyboard controls and ARIA labels update accordingly.
Confirm navigation links inside menu can be focused and activated by keyboard.

title: Page layout responsive design across viewport sizes
description: Validate that the landing page layout adapts correctly without visual breakage on various screen widths, including desktop, tablet, and mobile.

steps.description: Access the landing page on multiple devices or resize the browser to different viewport widths.
Verify that grid layouts, typography, images, and navigation respond gracefully without horizontal scroll or overlapping content.

title: Verify light and dark mode theme support
description: Test that the UI theme toggles or automatically adapts correctly between light and dark modes, preserving readability and visual consistency.

steps.description: Switch device or browser theme between light and dark, if supported.
Verify page colors, typography contrast, and UI elements update appropriately and remain readable.

title: Validate SEO essentials inclusion
description: Check webpage header for correct lang attribute, semantic HTML elements usage, meta descriptions, presence of favicon and robots.txt files.

steps.description: Inspect the landing page source or use developer tools to analyze head elements.
Verify the HTML tag includes correct lang attribute for Portuguese (Brazil).
Check presence of meta description tag with appropriate content.
Confirm semantic HTML sections (header, nav, main, footer, article, section) are used properly.
Verify the /favicon.ico and /robots.txt files are present on the server.
Ensure favicon loads correctly in the browser tab and robots.txt contains appropriate instructions.

title: Error handling: Invalid navigation link anchor
description: Simulate a broken or invalid anchor link in navigation and observe the behavior to ensure graceful handling.

steps.description: Modify navigation link to an invalid anchor (e.g., #invalid-section) and click it.
Verify the page does not throw errors and remains stable without crashing.
Check that no unexpected scroll occurs or user is alerted gracefully.

title: Edge case: Service card pricing display when data is missing
description: Test how service cards behave if pricing data for some pet sizes or service types is incomplete or missing.

steps.description: Simulate missing pricing data for a specific service card.
Verify the UI handles missing data gracefully, e.g., shows 'Contact us' or hides that row without breaking layout.

title: Edge case: Slow network impact on service card animation
description: Test if the IntersectionObserver fade-in animations still trigger correctly under slow network or delayed resource loading conditions.

steps.description: Simulate slow network connection (e.g., throttling in devtools).
Scroll through Services and Highlights sections.
Verify fade-in animations still trigger properly once the elements become visible.
